A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Hands down the best Star Wars movie since Empire Strikes Back.

Fleshed-out\, well-rounded characters driven by excellent writing and franchise best performances from the majority of the cast. Staggering attention to detail\, creating a truly spectacular and intimate look at the galaxy far\, far away. Thematic and moral complexity way beyond anything we've seen before. All this and the most visually striking entry into the series?

Don't listen to to the whiny fans. 

THIS is Star Wars.
